sensorstrings 1.0.1

Pivot sensor string data from long to wide format

ss_pivot_longer.Rd

Pivot sensor string data from long to wide format

Usage

ss_pivot_longer(dat_wide)

Arguments

dat_wide

Data frame of sensor string data in a wide format, as returned by ss_compile_**() functions.

Value

Returns dat in long format. Variables (e.g., temperature, dissolved, salinity, and depth measured by sensor) are in a column named variable and the associated measurement in a column named value.
